text: 19 2PL OBSERVATIONS There are potential schedules that are serializable but would not be allowed by 2PL. — Locking limits concurrency. May still have "dirty reads". — Solution: Strict 2PL May lead to deadlocks. — Solution: Detection or Prevention l" — 4 Lo 19 POERRERE adingon Boards > | X [ec) ; Œl [ CMU Database Systems - 17 Two-Phase Locking Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
